weapons.descTap: Fires a powerful blast and launches you backward. While launched, you deal damage to anything in your path.

weapons.descHold: Continuously fires a stream of bullets. Rate of fire and accuracy gradually decreases as weapon is fired.

weapons.descTap: Slashes a wide area in front of you.
weapons.descHoldExit: Fires a slow, large projectile in front of you.
weapons.descEffect: On an enemy kill, grants 1 level of Red Frenzy. On hit, loses all levels of Red Frenzy.
